ReturnPolicy.Description:
At CoutureUSA, our goal is to ensure that you are completely satisfied with every purchase. If for any reason you are dissatisfied with your order, you may return it within 30 days from the original order date and we will gladly exchange the item or give you a full refund. 

 All returned items must be in the same condition as when they were purchased and must include all original accessories and paperwork. DO NOT REMOVE the plastic security seal attached to your item. A 15% restocking fee will be assessed for any items that do not satisfy these requirements. 

 Refunds on returned items will be credited to the same method of payment used to make the original purchase and all refunds will be processed within the 2 business days following the return. 

 NOTE: We do not accept returns on international orders.

NOTE: We do not accept returns on international orders.Money-Back Authenticity Guarantee As one of the most trusted sources of pre-owned luxury handbags and accessories in the United States, we hold over 20 years of combined authentication experience.Our seasoned team of experts takes the apprehension out of buying so that you can focus on finding that next hard-to-find item you’ve been searching for. When making a purchase from Couture Boutique, you can rest assured that your item is 100% authentic. Each and every product in our inventory receives a comprehensivereview conducted by our reliable team of specialists. This authentication process includes an in-depth evaluation of the following: Our Authentication ProcessOur authentication process is a thorough review process that is conducted on every item that we receive and includes a detailed evaluation of the following:Manufacturing Materials.Craftsmanship.Hardware (if applicable).Brand/Logo Stamping.Serial Numbers/Date Codes.Lining Materials (if applicable).Stitching (if applicable).Packaging and Protective Sleeper/Dust Bags.Authenticity Cards, Care Booklets, Receipts (if applicable)and more...For questions related to authenticity, please contact Couture Boutique by phone at 888.969.7455.
